title: The Three Stooges. Vols. 17,18,21
brief_description: Compilation of three videos starring the Three Stooges in some of their funniest films. Titles include “Crash goes the hash” (dir. Jules White); “Three pests in a mess” (dir. Del Lord); “Three trouble dooers” (dir. Edward Bernds); “Rusty romeos” (dir. Jules White); “Merry mixup” (dir. Jules White); “Quizz wizz” (dir. Jules White); “Slippery silks” (dir. Jack White); “Flat foot Stooges” (dir. Charley Chase); “Whoops I’m an Indian” (dir. Del Lord). The Three Stooges consisted of Moe Howard, Shemp Howard and Larry Fine.
